p: There are few other vaccines under development in which their method and platform are either not available or it cannot be categorized in the mentioned groups. The University of Saskatchewan (VIDO InterVac) has a vaccine at the preclinical phase, which is enduring animal testing and is estimated to be ready for human trials next year ( https://www.sciencealert.com/oxford-university-has-just-launched-a-human-trial-of-a-potential-covid-19-vaccine).
